import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Checkout({ cartItems = [] }) { const total = cartItems.reduce( (sum, item) => sum + item.price * item.qty, 0 ); return (

Secure Checkout

{/* BILLING */}

Billing Details

{/* SUMMARY */}

Order Summary

{cartItems.length === 0 ? (

Cart is empty

) : ( <> {cartItems.map(item => (
{item.title} × {item.qty} ₹{item.price * item.qty}
))}
Total: ₹{total}
)}
← Continue Shopping
); }
